PrecisGranting of an annuity to Mrs. FRANCINE CHARTRAND MAUGHAN, widow of The Hon. Mr. Justice George B. Maughan, a Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec, and to each of his three children (Caroline, Christopher and Victoria), effective July 13, 2000.
